sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>
    <v-container
        class="fill-height"
        fluid
    >
      <v-row
          align="start"
          justify="center"
      >
        <v-col
            cols="12"
            sm="8"
            md="4"
        >
          <v-card class="elevation-24">
            <v-toolbar
                color="#3F51B5"
                dark
                flat
            >
              <v-toolbar-title>Iniciar sesi칩n</v-toolbar-title>
              <v-spacer />
            </v-toolbar>
            <v-card-text>
              <v-form
                  ref="form"
                  lazy-validation
              >
                <v-text-field
                    v-model="email"
                    label="Email"
                    :rules="rules.emailRules"
                    name="email"
                    :append-icon="'mdi-account'"
                    type="text"
                />
                <v-text-field
                    v-model="password"
                    label="Contrase침a"
                    name="password"
                    :rules="[rules.required, rules.maxPassword]"
                    :append-icon="showPassword ? 'mdi-eye' : 'mdi-eye-off'"
                    :type="showPassword ? 'text' : 'password'"
                    @click:append="showPassword = !showPassword"
                />
                <v-alert v-model="wrongEmailOrPassword" type="error">
                  Email o contrase침a incorrectos
                </v-alert>
              </v-form>
            </v-card-text>
            <v-card-actions>
              <v-spacer />
              <v-btn>
                Ingresar
              </v-btn>
              <v-btn>
                Crear cuenta
              </v-btn>
            </v-card-actions>
          </v-card>
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
    </v-container>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
import {mapState} from 'vuex'
export default {
  name: 'LoginForm',
  data: () => {
    return {
      password: '',
      email: '',
      showPassword: false,
      rules: {
        required: v => !!v || 'Este campo es requerido',
        maxPassword: v => v ? v && v.length <= 25 || 'Se ha superado el m치ximo permitido' : '',
        emailRules: [
          v => !!v || 'Email es requerido',
          v => /.+@.+\..+/.test(v) || 'Email incorrecto'
        ]
      },
      wrongEmailOrPassword: false
    }
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapState(['authenticated'])
  },
  mounted () {
  },
  methods: {
    createAccount () {
      this.$emit('create')
    },
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.button {
  width: 140px;
}
</style>
